todoList.title: Inspect project files
todoList.description: Open autoclicker.py, requirements.txt, and tests to determine dependencies and whether it can run in the browser.

todoList.title: Decide feasibility
todoList.description: Determine if the script uses OS-level APIs (pyautogui/keyboard) making client-side browser execution impossible, and list alternatives.

todoList.title: Provide instructions
todoList.description: Give concrete instructions for running in browser: Pyodide/Brython (client-side) if possible, or a local server + web UI (Flask) if not.

todoList.title: (Optional) Implement example
todoList.description: If the user wants, implement a minimal Flask-based web UI that calls the clicker script on the server and verify it works.
